statements: SELECT student_id, student_name, program_name, attendance_date, attended FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE program_name = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE attended = TRUE ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT program_name FROM student_attendance;
SELECT student_name, program_name FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_name, program_name FROM student_attendance WHERE attended = TRUE ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE program_name LIKE '%Science%' ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student_attendance GROUP BY student_id, student_name HAVING total_attendance > 5;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student_attendance WHERE attended = TRUE GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY total_attendance DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM student_attendance GROUP BY program_name HAVING total_students >= 3 ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE program_id = 100 ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, country FROM exchange_program WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student_attendance;
SELECT student_id, program_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, program_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE program_id = 2 AND attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT program_id, program_name, country FROM exchange_program WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, program_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 3 AND program_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY attendance_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM student_attendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY attendance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance_records;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance_records ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, program_id FROM student_attendance_records WHERE program_id = 101;
SELECT program_name, program_country FROM global_exchange_programs WHERE program_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM attendance_statuses ORDER BY status_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance_records WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, program_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance_records INNER JOIN global_exchange_programs ON student_attendance_records.program_id = global_exchange_programs.program_id;

SELECT student_name, program_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance_records INNER JOIN global_exchange_programs ON student_attendance_records.program_id = global_exchange_programs.program_id WHERE attendance_date = '2022-01-10';

SELECT student_name, program_name, attendance_date, status_name FROM student_attendance_records INNER JOIN global_exchange_programs ON student_attendance_records.program_id = global_exchange_programs.program_id INNER JOIN attendance_statuses ON student_attendance_records.status_id = attendance_statuses.status_id;

SELECT student_name, program_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance_records INNER JOIN global_exchange_programs ON student_attendance_records.program_id = global_exchange_programs.program_id WHERE program_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, age, country FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, instructor, semester FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, attendance_date FROM attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, country, start_date, end_date FROM exchange_programs WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, country FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, instructor, semester FROM courses WHERE semester = 1;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT program_name, country, start_date, end_date FROM exchange_programs ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance;
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, is_present FROM student_attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, program_id, attendance_date, is_present FROM student_attendance WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, department FROM student ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT program_name, location FROM program WHERE program_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE is_present = TRUE ORDER BY attendance_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student.first_name, student.last_name, program.program_name FROM student INNER JOIN program ON student.student_id = program.program_id;

SELECT student.first_name, student.last_name, program.program_name FROM student INNER JOIN program ON student.student_id = program.program_id WHERE student.department = 'Engineering' AND program.location = 'USA';
SELECT student.first_name, student.last_name, attendance_date, is_present FROM student_attendance JOIN student ON student_attendance.student_id = student.student_id;
SELECT feedback_id, student_id, program_id FROM attendance_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC LIMIT 5;
